text: Austin Lake is a lake located in the U.S. state of Michigan. At its longest, it is about 2.2 miles (3.5 km) long. On average, it is about 5 feet deep. It has a maximum depth of 11 feet. A boat launch is allowed if you pay $6 to local authorities. All watercraft are allowed. No alcoholic beverages are allowed. Category:Lakes of the United States Category:Geography of Michigan
title: Austin Lake
